backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and CRUD-like admin/user actions for history, memberships, clubs, and content with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and tests with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each main frontend component, page, and utility.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Documentation explaining how to generate an Android APK from the deployed PWA using TWA and Bubblewrap.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file containing SEO metadata, PWA tags, manifest link, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, display mode, colors, and metadata.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots rules allowing crawling, blocking admin pages, and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing public site routes with frequencies and priorities.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and network-first fetch caching for PWA support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application's routing tree using TanStack Router and links each path to its corresponding page component.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin-only pages by checking admin session state and redirecting unauthorized users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with quick links and dynamically loaded social media icons based on fetched link data.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA install banner when installable, offering install and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Provides the responsive top navigation bar with links, mobile menu, and admin-aware 'Me' link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login state with persisted session storage and simple credential validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Provides a hook to detect PWA installability, trigger the install prompt, track installation state, and dismiss prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating history content, membership registrations, clubs, and other backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with a top nav, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page describing the organization’s story, mission, vision, and values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface for editing and managing About page sections with add, remove, and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Implements an admin UI to create, edit, and delete clubs, including form handling and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard UI with navigation cards for editing home, about, history, and other site content, plus logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Provides a text editor to view and update the organization's history content using API hooks with save feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Allows admins to edit home page sections, modify titles/descriptions/images, add/remove sections, and save updates via API.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login form handling authentication, error states, loading state, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Fetches and displays membership registrations with details, handling loading, error, and empty states.
Admin page that loads existing social media links, lets admins edit them via a form, and saves updates with success and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single club, handling loading, error, and not‑found states with a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all clubs in a grid with loading and error handling, each linking to a dedicated club detail page.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Static contact page showing email, phone, address, and office hours using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders a list of predefined upcoming events with details and category badges.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows organization history content fetched from the backend with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component that loads about and homepage sections, renders hero content, default program highlights, and an install prompt banner.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Membership registration form with submission handling, success state display, and admin login link.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined youth programs with icons, descriptions, ages, schedules, and a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Utility functions to update canonical and Open Graph URL meta tags based on the current route.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration customizing colors, fonts, radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata describing current scope, architecture, features, known issues, and required/generated images. It tracks frontend/backend structure, admin workflows, and overall project state versioning.
